byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Beirut, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

abstract: Kurdish activists report Islamic State militants killed more than 150 people in and around Syrian Kurdish town Kobani on Turkish border; if death toll is accurate it would be one of largest mass killings by ISIS in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Islamic State fighters who sneaked into the Syrian Kurdish town of Kobani on the Turkish border killed more than 150 people there and in nearby villages.

headline.main: Mass Killings by ISIS Fighters in Syrian Kurdish Town
headline.print_headline: Mass Killings by ISIS Fighters in Syrian Kurdish Town

snippet: Islamic State fighters who sneaked into the Syrian Kurdish town of Kobani on the Turkish border killed more than 150 people there and in nearby villages.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
